Subskills.name: Heil Satan
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by satan's mark.

Subskills.name: Long Lasting Darkness
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of satan's mark.

Subskills.name: The Black Mass
Subskills.description: Satan's mark unleashes chains of unholy lightning when struck by black mass executing low life monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Mark of the Beast
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to spawn crows circling around the target location for a short duration dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Grasp of Lucifer
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of satan's mark.

Subskills.name: Satanic Transe
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of stacks applied to targets.

Subskills.name: Blood Ritual
Subskills.description: Increases the blood ripple area of effect radius of satan's mark.

Subskills.name: The Black Bible
Subskills.description: Chance to apply satan's mark to nearby monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Soul Combustion
Subskills.description: Satan's mark causes target souls to explode after a short delay dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Messenger of Satan
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of satan's mark.

Subskills.name: Reach of Darkness
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of satan's mark.

Subskills.name: False Prophecy
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: The Rapture
Subskills.description: Satan's mark is applied to monsters around you on a large radius with increased stacks. Satan's mark now has an increased cooldown.

Subskills.name: The Devil In I
Subskills.description: Stuns monsters affected by satan's mark inflicting arcane break.
